title: The Abstracterra portal
text: A portal came out of nowhere, creating the vast world of Abstracterra. After years of reasearch we can now safely go into it and come back by paying 2 sol

section.title: Rarity?
section.content: Rarity is given by complexity. Each have a different unique style that fit into a category, Some more valuable than others!

section.title: How many styles?
section.content: The Abstractera is home to 20 new different worlds. each with its own piece, different style. Maybe you will find more
